mapper.select:
SELECT report.*,customer.nickname as customerName, merchant.merchantName FROM report,customer,merchant WHERE customer.id=report.customerId AND merchant.id=report.merchantId
AND (customer.nickname LIKE concat('%', #{search}, '%') OR merchant.merchantName LIKE concat('%', #{search}, '%'))
AND report.status=#{status}
ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT record.*,user.name as operator FROM record,user WHERE record.reportId=#{reportId} AND record.operatorId=user.id ORDER BY time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record(operatorId, reportId, detail, type, reportStatus) VALUES (#{operatorId},#{reportId},#{detail}, #{type},#{reportStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET status=#{status} WHERE id=#{id}
